function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate air circulation and unsatisfactory temperature control","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission, discomfort for occupants","Mitigation":"Implementing HVAC systems with proper ventilation and filtration, maintaining indoor air quality standards","Technologies":"HVAC systems with HEPA filters, air purifiers, temperature and humidity control systems","People":"Occupants of the health club facilities","Owner":"Facility management"},{"Description":"Growth of fungi and accumulation of dust","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory illnesses and allergic reactions for occupants","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and maintenance of ventilation systems, use of antimicrobial materials, controlling humidity levels","Technologies":"Antimicrobial coatings, UV-C light air purification, humidity control systems","People":"Occupants of the health club facilities","Owner":"Facility management"},{"Description":"Poor ergonomics and utilization of space","Impact":"Increased risk of physical discomfort and injuries for occupants","Mitigation":"Redesigning layout for better ergonomics, providing ergonomic furniture and equipment, promoting proper posture and movement","Technologies":"Ergonomic furniture, adjustable workstations, sensors for posture monitoring","People":"Occupants of the health club facilities","Owner":"Facility management"}]}
